data.event: We think this could be the key that unlocks the future of how we'll be able to deal with the carbon that's coming off of existing coal-fired power plants."
Work on the pad for the pilot plant began several weeks ago, Guidarini said.

event.title: construction to be done in another couple of months

data.event: "We expect construction to be done in another couple of months," he said.
"We expect it to run for two years," Guidarini said.

event.title: will capture about 1,800 tons of carbon dioxide a year

data.event: The pilot plant will capture about 1,800 tons of carbon dioxide a year.
